summary.span: 用作充当 （或者其他服务器或用户）控件的容器的所有区域控件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for (or other server or user) controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Web 部件控件集中，区域是一个复合控件，呈现为 HTML 表，其中包含网页的定义区域中的其他控件。In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page. 类是继承自基类的区域，它 为包含 控件、服务器控件和用户控件的派生区域提供一组基本行为。The class is a zone that inherits from the base class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls, server controls, and user controls. 与 (和其他服务器) 控制的区域的组合构成了 Web 部件应用程序的主要 UI，这是用户在大多数时间交互的页面的正常视图。The combination of zones with (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time. 所有区域都为其所包含的控件提供一组通用的 UI 元素。All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain. 有关所有区域通用的 UI 元素的详细讨论，请参阅类的类概述主题 。For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 区域包括一个包含服务器控件的正文部分和一个关联的 对象，用于呈现包含的控件及其 chrome 元素，例如它们的谓词、边框等。The zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on. 除了从类继承的功能外， 类还添加了客户端控件拖动、特定的谓词 (来启用常见 UI 操作，例如最小化、关闭、删除和编辑控件) 和其他样式功能。In addition to the features inherited from the class, the class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features. 如果要设计数据库驱动的自定义区域，类也是继承自的类。The class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven. 例如，你可以创建从继承的自定义天气 Web 部件区域 ，并且设计为包含和提供布局功能，并为 绑定到数据和显示天气信息的控件提供布局功能和其他服务。For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from , and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for controls that are data-bound and display weather information. 类包含多个属性，这些属性用于处理区域中的样式属性。The class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone. 边框有多个属性，包括 和 。There are several properties for borders, including and . 有一组属性用于处理可在区域的标题中显示的菜单的样式属性，如 、 和其他。There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as , , and others. 类还包含若干用于处理区域中的谓词的成员。The class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone. 这些成员与区域中的部件控件上显示的谓词相关。These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone. 虽然可以将区域级别的谓词添加到 区域，但在默认情况下，它们没有任何。While zone-level verbs can be added to zones, by default they do not have any. Web 部件控件集附带一组标准谓词，可用于部分控件，开发人员也可以添加自定义谓词。There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well. 用于处理谓词的一些重要属性包括引用一些标准谓词对象的属性，例如 、、 和 。Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as , , , and , , and . 标准谓词出现在谓词菜单上 (通常以 UI 形式显示在区域中包含的每个控件的标题栏中的下拉菜单) 。The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone. 还提供了一个 属性，该属性允许你确定哪些类型的可单击对象表示 UI 中的谓词。There is also a property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI. 用于处理谓词的其他关键成员包括 方法，该方法是可重写的事件处理程序，用于谓词创建过程的自定义处理和 事件。Other key members for working with verbs include the method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the event. 类包含许多用于处理 包含在区域中的控件的成员。The class contains a number of members for working with controls contained within a zone. 属性引用 区域中所有 (和其他服务器) 控件的集合。The property references the collection of all (and other server) controls in the zone. 若干方法对应于用户可以对区域中的控件执行的标准谓词或操作 ，例如 、 和 。Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on controls in a zone, such as , , and . 类中还有很多 涉及 控件在区域中的布局或排列方式的成员。There are also a number of members in the class that concern how the controls are laid out or arranged within the zone. 属性确定控件是否可以在区域之间移动或在区域内重新排列。The property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users. 属性允许您确定区域中的控件是水平排列还是垂直排列。The property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically. > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer 可能会 以意外的方式呈现或其包含的控件的高度，具体取决于区域的方向。Internet Explorer might render the height of a or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅 或属性的文档 。For more details, see the documentation for the or the properties. 类中的其他方法 提供对区域的各个区域的呈现的详细编程控制。Other methods in the class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone. 其中的许多方法都重写从类继承的基方法 ，以自定义包含控件的区域的呈现 。Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain controls. 重要的方法包括 、、 和 。Important methods include , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 该代码演示如何 在 Web 部件页中以声明方式使用派生类来包含 控件。The code shows how a derived class, , is used declaratively in a Web Parts page to contain controls. 此代码示例包含四个部分：前三个部分说明了代码文件，第四个部分说明了如何运行代码。The code example has four sections: the first three sections describe the code files, and the fourth explains how to run the code. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件，该控件使用户能够将页面切换到不同的显示模式。The first part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch the page into different display modes. 若要详细了解 Web 部件显示模式以及此控件中代码的说明，请参阅 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on Web Parts display modes and a description of the code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 此代码示例的第二部分是一个代码旁置文件，其中包含用于处理主网页事件的代码。The second part of the code example is a code-beside file that contains the code to handle events for the main Web page. 此文件中的代码演示如何以编程方式使用某些键 成员。The code in this file shows how to work with some of the key members programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#4)] 此代码示例的第三部分是包含控件的网页，这些 控件表现自基类的行为 以及 包含在区域中的控件。The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the controls that exhibit behavior from the base class, and controls contained in the zones. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载网页。Load the Web page in a browser. 使用 " **显示模式** " 下拉列表控件将页面切换到设计模式，单击 控件，并尝试将其拖动到可见区域之间。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into design mode, click the controls, and try dragging them between the visible zones. 单击页面上的某些按钮，查看使用类的各种成员的效果 。Click some of the buttons on the page to see the effect of using various members of the class. 接下来，将页面切换到编辑模式。Next, switch the page to edit mode. 确保控件位于 中 `WebPartZone2` ，单击控件标题栏中的谓词菜单，然后单击 " **编辑** " 以编辑控件。Make sure a control is positioned in `WebPartZone2`, click the verbs menu on the control's title bar, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 完成该控件的编辑后，编辑另一个区域中的某个控件。Finish editing that control, and then edit one of the controls in the other zone. 执行这些步骤时，请注意控件的 UI 样式和区域之间的差异，它们是使用类的各种成员的效果 。As you carry out these steps, notice the differences in the UI styles of the controls and the zones, which are the effect of using the various members of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当区域处于可更改区域中控件的布局的页面显示模式（如）时，属性才会生效 。The property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as . 当在 给定区域上将设置为时 `false` ，将阻止最终用户在区域中的控件上执行多个操作：When is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - 用户不能将控件拖动到不同的区域、重新排列区域中的控件或将控件移到该区域。Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone. - 会禁用 (UI) 区域中控件的用户界面的多个属性， 以便用户在使用和控件编辑控件时无法编辑这些属性 。A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the and controls. - 用户不能从控件向区域中添加新控件 。Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a control. - 关闭、删除、最小化和还原谓词不显示在区域中的控件上。The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone. 尽管 属性影响最终用户通过 UI 更改区域布局的能力，但它不会影响以编程方式更改布局的功能。Although the property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically. 例如，如果 设置为，则 `false` 用户无法关闭区域中的控件，但开发人员仍可调用 方法来以编程方式关闭控件。For example, if is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the method to close controls programmatically. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示控件上属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和在此代码中包含区域的 .aspx 页面，请参阅 类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意， 属性设置为 `true` ，这是默认值。Notice that the property is set to `true`, which is the default. 如果将值更改为 `false` ，则在将页面加载到浏览器并将页面切换到设计显示模式后，将无法在区域内或区域中拖动控件 `WebPartZone2` 。If you change the value to `false`, after you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you will not be able to drag controls within or into the `WebPartZone2` zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用的关闭谓词 显示在区域中每个控件的谓词菜单中 。The close verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 关闭控件会将其从页上的交互中移除，不过，如果开发人员提供了相应的用户界面 (UI) （如 包含 控件的区域），则用户可以将页面切换到 ，然后将控件的以前关闭的实例添加回页面。Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a zone that contains a control, a user can switch the page into and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件上使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 要使代码示例正常运行，需要属性的 "示例" 部分中的所有代码 。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分来自分部类，并包含用于切换是否启用或禁用帮助谓词的代码。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the help verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 此代码示例的另一部分是承载自定义控件并包含 UI 的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the UI. 请注意，区域中的声明性元素会在 `` 控件的谓词菜单中设置表示关闭谓词的特定文本 。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the close verb in the verbs menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 另请注意，由于 代码示例中使用的基础自定义控件（已命名） `TextDisplayWebPart` `false` 在其构造函数中将属性设置为， `` 因此目录中的元素必须将 属性设置为 `true` ，以便可以在下面的代码示例中关闭控件。Notice also that, because the underlying custom control--named `TextDisplayWebPart`-- used in the code example sets the property to `false` in its constructor, the `` element in the catalog must set the property to `true`, so that the control can be closed in the following code example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，将页面切换到目录显示模式，然后将控件添加 `TextDisplayWebPart` 到页面。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 您可以使用此复选框来启用和禁用关闭谓词，还可以单击谓词菜单中的 " **关闭 WebPart** 谓词" 关闭控件。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the close verb, and you can click the **Close WebPart** verb in the verbs menu to close the control. 关闭控件后，如果您将页返回到目录显示模式，则可以单击 **页目录**，选择您关闭的控件的原始实例 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，然后在页上重新打开它。After you close the control, if you return the page to catalog display mode, you can click the **Page Catalog**, select the original instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control that you closed, and reopen it on the page.

summary.span: 关闭区域中选定的 控件。

span.span: Closes a selected control in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最终用户关闭控件的典型方式 是单击控件标题栏中的 "关闭" 谓词。The typical way for an end user to close a control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar. 方法对类调用 方法，该方法 执行关闭控件的操作。The method calls the method on the class, which carries out the action of closing the control. 方法只应由派生 区域（如）使用 。The method should only be used by derived zones such as . 关闭的 控件不在页上呈现。A closed control is not rendered on a page. 相反，它将添加到页目录中，后者维护页上所有已关闭控件的列表。Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page. 如果用户在其上关闭控件的 Web 部件页面还具有 `` 使用声明的元素 ，则用户可以将页面切换到目录显示模式，然后将已关闭的控件添加回页面。If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `` element declared with a , then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 为了使用户能够关闭 控件，该 控件上的属性和 区域上的属性都必须设置为 `true` 。For a user to be able to close a control, the property on the control and the property on the zone must both be set to `true`.

para.span: 如果重写 方法以在创建的样式上设置某些特定属性，请不要使用该 版本的构造函数，这要求您将控件的 对象作为参数传递，导致创建的 对象 与区域控件共享。

This causes rendering problems.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CreateVerbs As WebPartVerbsEventHandler

summary.span: 在为从 类派生的区域创建谓词时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the verbs are created for a zone that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面开发人员可以向此事件添加处理程序，并将其他自定义谓词附加到 子区域。Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a child zone. 为区域创建谓词时，将引发该事件，此操作在 页处理阶段或在回发事件期间发生。The event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the stage of page processing, or during postback events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何 通过重写 方法将自定义谓词添加到派生区域来为事件创建处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 此代码示例包含两个源文件。The code example contains two source files. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 此代码示例的第一部分是派生自类的简单控件的源代码 。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是用于 重写 方法以将自定义谓词添加到区域的派生区域的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 此代码还会创建一个自定义谓词，该谓词显示在 区域中包含的控件的谓词菜单中，谓词创建当前控件的另一个副本 。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 此代码示例的第三部分是承载派生区域和控件的网页 。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 页面顶部附近是 `Register` 用于引用派生区域组件的指令。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果在浏览器中加载页面，则 控件将显示在区域中。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 单击谓词菜单，单击 " **CopyWebPart** " 谓词，然后创建该控件的副本。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使派生区域能够替换自定义的 对象以更改区域中 控件的外观。

span.span: Enables derived zones to substitute a custom object to change the appearance of controls in a zone.

span.span: A that determines how controls in a zone are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件 chrome 是指外围用户界面 (UI) 区域中每个控件的框架元素 。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control in a zone. 控件的 chrome 包含其边框、标题栏和标题栏中显示的图标、标题文本和谓词菜单。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. Chrome 的外观在区域级别设置，适用于 区域中的所有控件。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all controls in a zone. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对象会影响控件的整个呈现 ，而不仅仅是其 chrome 元素。The object affects the entire rendering of the controls, not merely their chrome elements. 若要使用 方法，必须创建自定义 对象以定义区域中 Web 部件控件的 chrome 外观。To use the method, you must create a custom object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone. 还必须创建从类继承的自定义区域 并重写方法，以便 能够替换自定义 chrome 对象并将其应用于区域中的控件。You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the class and overrides the method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.

summary.span: 获取对 对象的引用，该对象使最终用户能够删除区域中的 控件。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to delete the controls in a zone.

value.span: 使最终用户能够删除 控件的 。

span.span: A that enables end users to delete controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用的删除谓词 显示在区域中每个动态控件标题栏的谓词下拉菜单中 。The delete verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic control in a zone. 删除谓词不适用于静态控件 (在网页的标记) 中声明的控件。The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page). 仅当页面处于使你可以更改页面布局的显示模式（如或）时，谓词才会出现在谓词菜单中 。The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as or . 删除控件将从页中永久删除该控件的实例。Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page. 与关闭的控件不同的是，控件的已删除实例永远无法添加回页面。Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page. 当用户删除控件，然后将页切换到时 ，如果该 区域包含 控件，则删除的控件实例在该控件中不可用。When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into , if the zone contains a control, the deleted control instance is not available in it. 如果控件在目录中可用，但已删除的实例已被永久删除，则用户可以添加控件的新实例。The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件上使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 要使代码示例正常运行，需要属性的 "示例" 部分中的所有代码 。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分来自分部类，并包含用于切换删除谓词是已启用还是已禁用的代码。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the delete verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 此代码示例的另一部分是承载自定义控件并包含 (UI) 用户界面的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，区域中的声明性元素会在 `` 控件的谓词下拉菜单中设置表示删除谓词的特定文本 。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the delete verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，将页面切换到目录显示模式，然后将控件添加 `TextDisplayWebPart` 到页面。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 您可以使用此复选框来启用和禁用控件上的删除谓词 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，但谓词仅在页处于目录或设计显示模式时显示在菜单上。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the delete verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, but the verb appears on the menu only while the page is in catalog or design display mode. 如果单击菜单上的 " **删除 WebPart** " 谓词，控件将被永久删除，并且无法将删除的实例添加回页面。If you click the **Delete WebPart** verb on the menu, the control is permanently deleted, and the deleted instance cannot be added back to the page. 但是，可以将该页返回到目录显示模式，并添加控件的新实例 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。However, you can return the page to catalog display mode, and add a new instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性从基本属性获取其值 ，如果该值为 `null` ，则使用该区域的 值。The property either gets its value from the base property or, if that value is `null`, uses the value for the zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示控件上属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和在此代码中包含区域的 .aspx 页面，请参阅 类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，在下面的代码示例中， 从分部类中检索属性值。Notice that in the following code example, the property value is retrieved from the partial class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将拖动的控件保存在可以放置该控件的区域上时，将显示放置提示区域，并显示可在其中放置该控件的区域，并且它适用于这些区域以及区域本身， 属性影响边框颜色。When a dragged control is held over a zone where it can be dropped, drop-cue regions appear, showing the area in which the control can be dropped, and it is for these regions, as well as the zone itself, that the property affects the border color. 使用 属性可以设置当用户在区域中拖动控件时显示给用户的颜色。The property enables you to set the color that appears to a user when they drag a control in the zone. 仅当网页处于显示模式时才会生效，该模式允许更改区域的布局，例如 。The property takes effect only when a Web page is in a display mode that enables the layout of a zone to be changed, such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示控件上属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和在此代码中包含区域的 .aspx 页面，请参阅 类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意， 属性值设置为特定颜色。Notice that the property value is set to a specific color. 将页面加载到浏览器并将页面切换到设计显示模式后，当你在其区域中选择并拖动控件或将另一个控件拖动到区域中时，可以看到该属性的效果。After you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you can see the effect of the property when you select and drag the control within its zone, or drag another control into the zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件上的属性所引用的编辑谓词 使最终用户能够将 区域中的控件切换到编辑模式，用户可以在该模式下个性化控件的外观、属性、布局和内容。The edit verb referenced by the property on a control enables an end user to switch a control in the zone into edit mode, where the user can personalize the appearance, properties, layout, and content of the control. 同一编辑谓词用于区域中的所有控件。The same edit verb is used for all controls in a zone. Web 部件页面进入编辑显示模式 () 时，在该 区域中包含的每个控件的谓词菜单中都将显示编辑谓词。When a Web Parts page enters into the edit display mode (), the edit verb becomes visible in the verbs menu of each control contained in the zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示控件上属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 请注意，通过将 `` 元素与控件一起使用，可以声明方式访问属性 `WebPartZone1` 。Note that the property is accessed declaratively by using the `` element with the `WebPartZone1` control. 即使你未在此处使用元素，也可以在编辑模式下在此控件上出现编辑谓词， `` 但你可以在用户界面中设置它的一些属性，例如 (UI) 中表示谓词的文本。An edit verb would be present on this control in edit mode even if you did not use the `` element here, but by using it, you can set some of its attributes, such as the text that represents the verb in the user interface (UI). 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和在此代码中包含区域的 .aspx 页面，请参阅 类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写基属性，以区分未设置属性的情况，以及将属性设置为空字符串 ( "" ) 的情况。The property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string (""). 如果尚未设置属性，并且区域不包含任何控件，当 Web 部件页面进入显示模式（区域可见）时，空控件中将显示默认的区域性特定短信 。If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty control. 如果 属性值被有意设置为空字符串，则空区域中将不会出现任何文本消息。If the property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示控件上属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和在此代码中包含区域的 .aspx 页面，请参阅 类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，在 声明性标记中有一个分配给该属性的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 此值将显示在中 `WebPartZone2` ，将页面加载到浏览器后，将页面切换到设计显示模式，然后将显示日期的控件从拖 `WebPartZone2` 到中 `WebPartZone1` 。This value will appear in `WebPartZone2`, after you load the page into a browser, switch the page into design display mode, and drag the control that displays the date from `WebPartZone2` into `WebPartZone1`. 有关在 Web 部件页中更改显示模式的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information on changing display modes in a Web Parts page, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用的导出谓词 将显示在区域中每个控件的标题栏中的谓词下拉菜单中 。The export verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs drop-down menu within the title bar of each control in a zone. 谓词出现在所有页面显示模式下的谓词菜单中。The verb appears in the verbs menu in all page display modes. 若要允许用户导出控件的定义文件 ，还必须将控件的属性设置 为其默认值以外的值，即 。To enable users to export a definition file for a control, you must also set the property on a control to something other than its default value, which is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件上使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 要使代码示例正常运行，需要属性的 "示例" 部分中的所有代码 。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分来自分部类，并包含用于切换是启用还是禁用导出谓词的代码。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the export verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 此代码示例的另一部分是承载自定义控件并包含 (UI) 用户界面的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，区域中的声明性 `` 元素会在控件的谓词下拉菜单中设置表示导出谓词的特定文本 。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the export verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 最后请注意，在下面的代码示例中，元素上的声明性 属性值 `` 设置为值 `All` ，这意味着将导出控件上的所有可导出属性值。Finally, notice that in the following code example, the declarative property value on the `` element is set to the value `All`, meaning that all exportable property values on the control will be exported. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#3)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，将页面切换到目录显示模式，然后将控件添加 `TextDisplayWebPart` 到页面。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page. 您可以使用此复选框来启用和禁用控件上的导出谓词 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the export verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 如果单击导出谓词，系统将提示你输入本地路径以保存控件的定义文件。If you click the export verb, you are prompted for a local path to save a definition file for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当存在可确定区域中的控件的预先存在的模板或其他形式的存储时，方法才获取区域的控件的初始集合。The method gets the initial collection of controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone. 方法不反映任何个性化设置更改，这可能意味着初始集合中的控件实际上已由用户移动到另一个区域。The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone. 区域中的控件的初始集合 不一定与区域的属性中包含的集合相同 ，这反映了页面呈现时区域中控件的实际当前集合，并考虑了已进行的任何个性化设置更改。The initial collection of controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以通过声明方式或以编程方式访问属性。The property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. 您可以通过使用 `` 元素设置文本、说明、是否启用谓词以及其他属性，在区域中以声明方式访问它。You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes. 但不需要为区域声明帮助谓词，因为它在默认情况下处于启用状态。It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default. 若要使帮助谓词在运行时在区域中的控件的谓词菜单上显示，唯一必要的步骤 是为各个控件的属性分配一个值 。The only step that is necessary to enable a help verb to appear on the verbs menu of controls in a zone at run time is to assign a value to the property for individual controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件上使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 要使代码示例正常运行，除了下面的代码外，还需要自定义 控件。For the code example to work, in addition to the following code, you need a custom control. 您可以使用自己的控件，或使用在 `TextDisplayWebPart` 类概述的 "示例" 部分中找到的自定义控件的代码 。You can either use your own control, or use the code for the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control found in the Example section of the class overview. 此代码示例包含一个用户控件，使您可以更改网页上的显示模式。This code example includes a user control to enable you to change display modes on a Web page. 有关显示模式和此控件中的源代码的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#10)] 此代码示例还包括一个可包含控件帮助内容的 HTML 页面 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。This code example also includes an HTML page that could contain Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 若要使此示例正常运行，必须将以下代码保存到名为 Textwebparthelp.htm 的文件中，并将其放在站点的同一目录中，并将其放在承载控件的 .aspx 页面所在的同一目录中。 `TextDisplayWebPart`For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. ``` Text Content WebPart Help

Text Content WebPart Help

To make the WebPart control work...
``` 此代码示例还包括以下分部类，其中包含用于处理 .aspx 页中的事件的代码。The code example also includes the following partial class that contains the code to handle the events in the .aspx page. summary.span: 获取或设置指示区域中的控件是垂直排列还是水平排列的值。

span.span: An value that determines how controls in a zone are arranged.

value.span: 默认方向为 。

span.span: The default orientation is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性涉及如何在区域中布局 Web 部件控件。The property concerns how Web Parts controls are laid out in a zone. 使用默认 方向时，控件将根据每个控件的值以从上到下的方式呈现 。With the default orientation, the controls are rendered in a top-to-bottom arrangement, according to the value of each control. 对于 方向，控件并排排列，受区域的宽度的限制。With a orientation, the controls are arranged side by side, subject to the width of the zone. Internet Explorer 可能会影响控件的高度 以及包含它的区域的高度。Internet Explorer can affect the height of a control, and the height of the zone that contains it. Internet Explorer 会在兼容模式下呈现网页 (向后) 或在标准模式下 (，在页) 中存在声明时向后兼容 `DOCTYPE` 。Internet Explorer renders web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions), or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page). 有关这些模式的信息，请参阅 DHTML [document.compatmode](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) 属性。For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property. Internet Explorer 在标准模式下呈现页面时，在某些情况下，它不会在表中调整单元格的大小，即使单元格的 HTML 标记为时也是如此 `` 。When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, in some scenarios it does not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is ``. 因此， 将呈现控件及其包含区域，以便控件不会延伸到区域的全部高度。As a result, controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone. 这种类型的呈现在两种情况下发生。This type of rendering occurs in two cases. - 当区域的 属性设置为时，将在 区域上显式设置高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you explicitly set the height on the zone. 若要使控件能够填充区域的全部高度，请不要指定水平区域的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontal zone. - 当区域的 属性设置为时 ，不会显式设置区域 (或包含的控件) 的高度。When a zone's property is set to , and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone (or of the contained controls). 若要使控件能够填充区域的全部高度，请设置区域或垂直区域中控件的高度。To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertical zone. 本主题中的代码示例演示属性的正常使用情况 。The code example in this topic demonstrates normal usage of the property. 有关演示与高度相关的呈现问题及其解决方法的代码示例，请参见 属性。For a code example that demonstrates the height-related rendering issue and how to work around it, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示控件上属性的声明性和编程使用 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative and programmatic use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和在此代码中包含区域的 .aspx 页面，请参阅 类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，在 声明性标记中有一个分配给该属性的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 在将 `WebPartZone1` 页面加载到浏览器中之后，此值会影响。This value impacts `WebPartZone1`, after you load the page into a browser. 区域中的 Web 部件控件在水平方向上呈现。The Web Parts controls in the zone are rendered horizontally. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview_vb.aspx#2)] 您可以单击 " **切换布局方向** " 按钮以更改区域的方向。You can click the **Toggle Layout Orientation** button to change the orientation of the zone. 用于切换方向的代码出现在分部类中的以下代码示例中。The code to toggle the orientation occurs in the following code example from the partial class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/CS/webpartzonebase_overview.cs#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Overview/VB/webpartzonebase_overview.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，您可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法会重写基 方法，以加载派生自类的区域中的谓词和谓词菜单的状态 。The method overrides the base method to load state for the verbs and the verbs menu in a zone derived from the class.

span.span: A that contains the style attributes for check mark images in a verbs menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当谓词菜单中的某个自定义 对象的 属性值设置为时，此属性才适用 `true` 。The property applies only when there is a custom object in a verbs menu that has its property value set to `true`. 属性中包含的样式属性 与在菜单中谓词的文本旁显示的选中标记图像的样式有关。The style attributes contained in the property pertain to the style of the check mark image that appears next to the verb's text in the menu. 区域中的每个 控件的 标题栏中都有其自己的谓词菜单。Each control in a zone has its own verbs menu in its title bar. 谓词菜单可以同时包含 Web 部件控件集中包括的标准谓词和 开发人员创建的自定义对象。The verbs menu can contain both standard verbs included in the Web Parts control set, and custom objects created by developers. 控制谓词菜单中的标准谓词（ 包括用于导出、删除和打开帮助页的谓词）是执行任务一次并完成的单一操作谓词。The standard verbs in a control verbs menu--including the verbs for exporting, deleting, and opening a Help page--are single-action verbs that carry out their tasks once and are done. 不需要在菜单中使用复选标记来标记这些谓词，因为它们都不指示任何类型的继续状态。There is no need to ever mark these verbs in the menu with a check mark, because none of them indicate any sort of continuing state. 因此， 无法设置这些谓词上的属性，并且属性根本 不应用于它们。Therefore, the property on these verbs cannot be set, and the property does not apply to them at all. 但是，开发人员可以创建自定义 控件，该控件可能通过将其属性设置为来指示带有选中标记的继续状态 `true` 。However, developers can create a custom control that might indicate a continuing state with a check mark, by setting its property to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以设置显示在区域中每个控件上的下拉谓词菜单的样式特性 。The property enables you to set style attributes for the drop-down verbs menu that appears on each control in a zone. 尽管对象本身是只读的，但仍可以设置基础属性的值。While the object itself is read-only, you can still set values for the underlying attributes. 可以设置整个菜单的样式特性，如边框颜色、样式和宽度;字体详细信息;高度和宽度;背景色;单元格填充和间距;如果用户操作系统) 中启用了隐藏功能，阴影颜色 (和网格线。You can set style attributes for the entire menu, such as its border color, style, and width; font details; height and width; background color; cell padding and spacing; shadow color (if shadowing is enabled in the user's operating system); and gridlines. 仅当 属性值设置为（默认值）时，此属性才适用 。The property applies only when the property value is set to , which is the default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户将鼠标指针放在其中一个谓词上时，属性中包含的样式信息适用于谓词菜单中的单个谓词。The style information contained in the property applies to an individual verb in a verbs menu, when a user positions a mouse pointer over one of the verbs. 尽管此属性是只读的，但您可以设置基础对象的样式特性 。Although this property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying object. 由于包含谓词的菜单是使用 Microsoft Internet Explorer 的弹出对象创建的，因此，当您将鼠标指针放在具有不同文本长度的谓词上时，菜单将不会正确呈现边框。Because the menu that contains the verbs is created using Microsoft Internet Explorer's pop-up object, the menu does not correctly render its border when you place your mouse pointer over verbs that have different text lengths. 此操作的最佳解决方法是声明 `` 具有不可见边框的元素，以便所有谓词的菜单宽度都具有完全相同的大小。The best workaround for this is to declare a `` element with an invisible border, so the menu width for all verbs is exactly the same size. 声明性元素会出现在区域内，如下所示：The declarative element would occur within a zone, and would look as follows: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示控件上属性的声明性用法 。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和在此代码中包含区域的 .aspx 页面，请参阅 类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 请注意，在 声明性标记中有一个分配给该属性的值。Notice that the property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup. 此值会影响 `WebPartZone2` 。This value impacts `WebPartZone2`. 将页面加载到浏览器中后，将页面切换到编辑模式。After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode. 单击谓词菜单，可以看到控件上的谓词菜单的背景色 `WebPartZone2` 是声明性标记中分配给它的颜色。Click the verbs menu, and notice that the background color for the verbs menu on the control in `WebPartZone2` is the color assigned to it in the declarative markup. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用的最小化谓词 显示在区域中每个控件的谓词菜单中 。The minimize verb referenced by the property appears in the verbs menu of each control in a zone. 谓词出现在所有页面显示模式中。The verb appears in all page display modes. 最小化控件会将其缩小到较小的大小，只留下控件的标题栏可见，并使还原谓词在标题栏中可见。Minimizing a control collapses it down to a smaller size, leaves only the title bar of the control visible, and makes a restore verb visible in the title bar. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件上使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 要使代码示例正常运行，需要属性的 "示例" 部分中的所有代码 。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分来自分部类，并包含用于切换最小化谓词是已启用还是已禁用的代码。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the minimize verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 此代码示例的另一部分是承载自定义 控件并包含 (UI) 用户界面的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，区域中的声明性 `` 元素 `Description` 会设置特性文本的值，当用户将鼠标指针放在谓词菜单中的谓词上时，它将显示为工具提示。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，将页面切换到目录显示模式，然后将控件添加 `TextDisplayWebPart` 到页面（如果尚未添加）。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added. 您可以使用此复选框来启用和禁用控件上的最小化谓词 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the minimize verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 启用谓词后，还可以单击它来最小化控件。When the verb is enabled, you can also click it to minimize the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以重写 派生区域类中的方法 ，将其他 对象添加到区域中的标准谓词集合。You can override the method in a derived zone class to add additional objects to the collection of standard verbs in your zone. 为此，可以在属性中将谓词添加到集合中 。You can do this by adding verbs to the collection in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何 通过重写 方法将自定义谓词添加到派生区域来为事件创建处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the event by overriding the method to add a custom verb to a derived zone. 此代码示例包含两个源文件。The code example contains two source files. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 此代码示例的第一部分是派生自类的简单控件的源代码 。The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the class. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/SimpleControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/SimpleControl.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是用于 重写 方法以将自定义谓词添加到区域的派生区域的源代码。The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived zone that overrides the method to add a custom verb to the zone. 此代码还会创建一个自定义谓词，该谓词显示在 区域中包含的控件的谓词菜单中，谓词创建当前控件的另一个副本 。The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/ZoneWithAddedVerb.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/ZoneWithAddedVerb.vb#3)] 此代码示例的第三部分是承载派生区域和控件的网页 。The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and control. 页面顶部附近是 `Register` 用于引用派生区域组件的指令。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component. 如果在浏览器中加载页面，则 控件将显示在区域中。If you load the page in a browser, the control appears in the zone. 单击谓词菜单，单击 " **CopyWebPart** " 谓词，然后创建该控件的副本。Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartVerb2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartVerb2/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件最小化时，属性引用的还原谓词将显示在区域中每个控件的谓词菜单中。The restore verb referenced by the property appears within the verbs menu of each control in a zone, when a control is minimized. 谓词出现在所有页面显示模式下的菜单中。The verb appears in the menu in all page display modes. 恢复控件之前，控件会将其扩展回其正常大小。Restoring a control expands it back to its normal size after the control has been previously minimized. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 控件上使用属性 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property on a control. 要使代码示例正常运行，需要属性的 "示例" 部分中的所有代码 。For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the property. 下面的代码示例部分来自分部类，并包含用于切换是启用还是禁用还原谓词的代码。The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the restore verb is enabled or disabled. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs.vb#5)] 此代码示例的另一部分是承载自定义 控件并包含 (UI) 用户界面的网页。The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI). 请注意，区域中的声明性 `` 元素 `Description` 会设置特性文本的值，当用户将鼠标指针放在谓词菜单中的谓词上时，它将显示为工具提示。Notice that the declarative `` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/CS/webpartzonebase_verbs_cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneBase_Verbs/VB/webpartzonebase_verbs_vb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，将页面切换到目录显示模式，然后将控件添加 `TextDisplayWebPart` 到页面（如果尚未添加）。After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added. 使用最小化谓词来最小化控件，并注意还原谓词变为可见。Use the minimize verb to minimize the control, and note that the restore verb becomes visible. 您可以使用此复选框来启用和禁用还原谓词。You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the restore verb.

span.span: A that determines what kind of button is associated with the verbs in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件谓词表示用户可以在 Web 部件页的用户界面 (UI) 中执行的操作，例如最小化、关闭或还原控件;向页面添加控件;或取消操作。Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action. 谓词在 UI 中由一个可单击的对象表示，您可以使用属性将其设置为显示为超链接、图像或按钮 。A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button by using the property. 此 属性仅适用于存在于区域级别的谓词，而不是存在于区域中每个控件中的谓词 。The property applies to verbs that exist only at the zone level, as opposed to verbs that exist in each of the controls in a zone. 例如，将页面切换到目录模式或编辑模式时，区域的页脚中有一些区域级别的谓词，它们仅适用于整个区域级别的操作。For example, when you switch a page into catalog mode or edit mode, there are zone-level verbs in the footers of the zones that apply only to actions at the level of the entire zone. 当使用较旧的 ( "下层" ) 浏览器访问 Web 部件页面时，将应用该属性。The property is applied when the Web Parts page is accessed with an older ("down-level") browser. 必须为 每个特定谓词的属性分配一个值，以便在其区域中为该谓词显示图像。You must assign a value to the property for each specific verb to cause an image to appear for that verb in its zone. 如果未提供图像的 URL，谓词的 属性默认为 。If you do not provide the URL to an image, the verb's property defaults to . 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以包含对直接从类继承的控件以及 区域中其他 ASP.NET 服务器控件或自定义控件的引用。The property can contain references to controls that inherit directly from the class, as well as other ASP.NET server controls or custom controls within a zone. Web 部件控件集在运行时动态包装不是控件的任何控件 ; 这种机制使您可以使用所有类型的 ASP.NET 控件作为 Web 部件控件。The Web Parts control set dynamically wraps any control that is not a control as a control at run time; this mechanism enables you to use all types of ASP.NET controls as Web Parts controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用 控件上的属性 。The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the property on a control. 有关完整的代码示例，包括代码隐藏源文件和在此代码中包含区域的 .aspx 页面，请参阅 类概述。For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the class overview. 下面的代码示例 以编程方式访问属性，并显示包含在中的控件的列表 `WebPartZone1` 。The following code example accesses the property programmatically and displays a list of the controls contained in `WebPartZone1`. 将页面加载到浏览器后，单击标记为 **List WebPartZone1 webpart**的按钮。After you load the page into a browser, click the button labeled **List WebPartZone1 WebParts**. 将显示控件的 Id 和类型。The IDs and types of the controls are displayed.
